# RAG Pipeline Project

## Project Overview
This is a modular retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipeline with 6 alphabetically-ordered Python modules.

## Module Structure
- `a_dataset_ingestion.py` - Dataset loading
- `b_preprocessing_cleaning.py` - Text preprocessing
- `c_indexing.py` - Index creation
- `d_retriever.py` - Document retrieval
- `e_candidate_processing.py` - Result processing
- `f_reading_answering.py` - Answer generation

## Development Guidelines
- Each module should be independently testable
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
- Add docstrings to all functions and modules
- Use type hints where applicable
